title: Predicting Power Outage Severity in U.S.
description: A data science project exploring how the cause of power outages—natural events vs. other factors—impacts the number of customers affected. Includes data cleaning, visualizations, hypothesis testing, and predictive modeling.

title: Association between lifestyle factors and cancer severity scores
description: This project aims to build on prior work by examining how genetic risk factors and modifiable lifestyle factors jointly associate with cancer severity in the United States between 2015 and 2024.

title: Factors affecting the possibility of successful transactions
description: This project aims for discovering how different page types, specific dates, and website metrics could affect the possibility of successful transactions.

title: K-vlog project
description: Self-introduction video for korean learning classes.

title: Literature analysis project
description: A literature analysis for how criticism is utilized in 'Fahrenheit 451'.

title: Art work analysis project
description: This paper explores how Tang dynasty court paintings, especially Zhang Xuan’s Court Ladies Preparing Silk and Zhou Fang’s Ladies Adorning Their Hair with Flowers, represent femininity.

title: Ethn women rights poster
description: Our final project sparks an Asian Women's Community in Migration, highlighting their suffering, struggles, as well as resistance.

title: Physics experiment paper
description: An experiment about discovering the relationship between the rolling distance of a bottle and its weight.

title: Ethn literature picture
description: Creating a painting based on the descriptive scenes from a dystopian novel.

title: Calculus in Motion
description: A project visualizing how calculus principles—such as derivatives and integrals—describe real-world motion, including velocity, acceleration, and area under a curve.

title: Global Trade Flow Analysis
description: Analyzed international trade data to visualize how import and export patterns reflect global economic relationships and supply chain dependencies.

title: Second Project
description: Another example project to demonstrate templating.
